generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap");*{margin:0;padding:0}body{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif}.app{position:fixed;bottom:30px;right:30px}.message-container{box-shadow:0 0 18px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 0 32px 32px rgba(0,0,0,.08);max-width:400px;width:100vw;right:-25px;bottom:75px;position:absolute;transition:bottom .2s ease}.message-container.hidden{bottom:-100vh}.message-container .content{padding:30px 20px;display:flex;background-color:#fff;row-gap:10px;flex-direction:column;position:relative}.message-container .heading{margin:0;padding:20px;color:#fff;background-color:#ff7f00}.message-container .heading h3{font-weight:500;margin-bottom:8px;text-align:center}.message-container form input{border-radius:5px;border:1px solid rgba(71,71,71,.5);padding:10px;font-family:Raleway,sans-serif}.message-container form input:focus,.message-container form textarea:focus{outline:0}.message-container form textarea{height:100px;padding:10px;resize:none;border-radius:5px;border:1px solid rgba(71,71,71,.5);font-family:Raleway,sans-serif}.message-container form textarea::placeholder{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif}.message-container form button{cursor:pointer;background-color:#ff7f00;color:#fff;border:0;border-radius:4px;padding:10px;filter:brightness(1);transition:filter .4s ease}.message-container form button:hover{filter:brightness(.85)}.icon{cursor:pointer;width:70%;position:absolute;top:9px;left:9px;transition:transform .3s ease}.hidden{transform:scale(0)}.button-container{background-color:#ff7f00;width:60px;height:60px;border-radius:50%;filter:brightness(1);transition:filter .4s ease}.button-container:hover{filter:brightness(.85)}.loader{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background-color:#202022;opacity:.5}.sk-chase{width:40px;height:40px;position:relative;animation:sk-chase 2.5s linear infinite both}.sk-chase-dot{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;left:0;top:0;animation:sk-chase-dot 2s ease-in-out infinite both}.sk-chase-dot:before{content:"";display:block;width:25%;height:25%;background-color:#fff;border-radius:100%;animation:sk-chase-dot-before 2s ease-in-out infinite both}.sk-chase-dot:first-child{animation-delay:-1.1s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(2){animation-delay:-1s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(3){animation-delay:-.9s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(4){animation-delay:-.8s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(5){animation-delay:-.7s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(6){animation-delay:-.6s}.sk-chase-dot:first-child:before{animation-delay:-1.1s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(2):before{animation-delay:-1s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(3):before{animation-delay:-.9s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(4):before{animation-delay:-.8s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(5):before{animation-delay:-.7s}.sk-chase-dot:nth-child(6):before{animation-delay:-.6s}@keyframes sk-chase{to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes sk-chase-dot{80%,to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes sk-chase-dot-before{50%{transform:scale(.4)}0%,to{transform:scale(1)}}
